arts.ttl: Serie A official line-ups: Roma vs. Udinese
arts.sum: Roma cannot afford squad rotation due to injuries, as Artem Dovbyk and Matias Soulé lead...

Roma's 1-0 defeat against AC Milan last time out in the league denied them the chance to go to the top of Serie A however they followed it up with a 2-0 win against Rangers in Europe in midweek. Udin...

arts.ttl: Roma host Udinese aiming to bounce back
arts.sum: Nicolò Zaniolo on 3 goals after 10 rounds: only in the 2019/20 season was the Udinese player on 3 goals after the first match in November, finishing the season on 6 wearing Roma`s shirt. Roma and Udinese meet at the Olimpico on matchday 11 in Serie A.

arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Udinese – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma are set to host Udinese at the Stadio Olimpico this Sunday in what will be their final Serie A game before the November international break. Roma aim to claim all three points to maintain their strong run and remain competitive in the Serie A title race. arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Udinese – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma welcome Udinese to Stadio Olimpico on Sunday in their last Serie A fixture before the November international break. Roma will look to secure all three points, keep the momentum, and keep themselves in the hunt for the Serie A title. AS Roma vs Udinese – Match preview and team news Date: Sunday, 9th November.
